List<Container> Tibia.Objects.Inventory.GetContainers (  ) 

Return a list of all the containers open in the inventory. Use getContainers().Count to find how many are open.

Item Tibia.Objects.Inventory.FindNext (  ) 

Used after calling FindItem, gets the next item (eg. for stacking).

Returns:
FindNext().Found == false if nothing found.

Item Tibia.Objects.Inventory.FindItem ( Predicate< Item >  match,
bool  checkSlot 
)

Find an item in the player's inventory.

Parameters:
match A delegate that returns true when a matched item is found.
checkSlot If true, also checks the player's slots for the item.
Returns:
Item object describing the item and its location.
